verses.verse: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Where is the bill <S%H5612><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%>'s divorcement <S%H3748><s%>, wherewith I have put her away <S%H7971><s%>? or which of my creditors <S%H5383><s%> is it to whom I have sold <S%H4376><s%> you <S%H5771><s%>? Behold, for your iniquities were ye sold <S%H4376><s%>, and for your transgressions <S%H6588><s%> was your mother <S%H517><s%> put away <S%H7971><s%>.

Wherefore <S%H935><s%>, when I came, was there no man <S%H376><s%>? when I called <S%H7121><s%>, was there none to answer <S%H6030><s%>? Is my hand <S%H3027><s%> shortened <S%H7114><s%> at all <S%H7114><s%>, that it cannot redeem <S%H6304><s%>? or have I no power <S%H3581><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%>? Behold <S%H1606><s%>, at my rebuke I dry up <S%H2717><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>, I make <S%H7760><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> a wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: their fish <S%H1710><s%> stink <S%H887><s%>, because there is no water <S%H4325><s%>, and die <S%H4191><s%> for thirst <S%H6772><s%>.
I clothe <S%H3847><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> with blackness <S%H6940><s%>, and I make <S%H7760><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> their covering <S%H3682><s%>.

The Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> me the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of them that are taught <S%H3928><s%>, that I may know <S%H3045><s%> how to sustain <S%H5790><s%> with words <S%H1697><s%> him that is weary <S%H3287><s%>: he wakeneth <S%H5782><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning <S%H1242><s%>, he wakeneth <S%H5782><s%> mine ear <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> as they that are taught <S%H3928><s%>.
The Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> hath opened <S%H6605><s%> mine ear <S%H241><s%>, and I was not rebellious <S%H4784><s%>, neither turned away <S%H5472><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>.

I gave <S%H5414><s%> my back <S%H1460><s%> to the smiters <S%H5221><s%>, and my cheeks <S%H3895><s%> to them that plucked off <S%H4803><s%> the hair <S%H5641><s%>; I hid not my face <S%H6440><s%> from shame <S%H3639><s%> and spitting <S%H7536><s%>.

For the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H3637><s%>; therefore have I not been confounded: therefore have I set <S%H7760><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> like a flint <S%H2496><s%>, and I know <S%H3045><s%> that I shall not be put to shame <S%H954><s%>.

He is near <S%H7138><s%> that justifieth <S%H6663><s%> me <S%H7378><s%>; who will contend with me <S%H5975><s%>? let us stand up together <S%H3162><s%>: who is mine adversary <S%H1167><s%>? let him come near to me <S%H5066><s%>.

Behold <S%H136><s%>, the Lord Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H7561><s%>; who is he that shall condemn me <S%H1086><s%>? behold, all they shall wax old as a garment <S%H899><s%>, the moth <S%H6211><s%> shall eat them up <S%H398><s%>.

Who is among you that feareth <S%H3373><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that obeyeth <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his servant <S%H5650><s%>? he that walketh <S%H1980><s%> in darkness <S%H2825><s%>, and hath no light <S%H5051><s%>, let him trust <S%H982><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and rely <S%H8172><s%> upon his God <S%H430><s%>.

Behold <S%H6919><s%>, all ye that kindle a fire <S%H784><s%>, that gird yourselves about <S%H247><s%> with firebrands <S%H2131><s%>; walk <S%H3212><s%> ye in the flame <S%H217><s%> of your fire <S%H784><s%>, and among the brands <S%H2131><s%> that ye have kindled <S%H1197><s%>. This shall ye have of my hand <S%H3027><s%>; ye shall lie down <S%H7901><s%> in sorrow <S%H4620><s%>.
